long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The MVT Session Extension allows users to seamlessly take and manage screenshots across multiple pages and tabs with a persistent toolbar. Perfect for research, documentation, and web testing, this extension lets you start and end screenshot sessions, capture full-page screenshots, and automatically organize your images with session details.

Key Features:

1. Persistent Screenshot Toolbar: Always available for quick access to capture screenshots while browsing.
2. Session Tracking: Start and end sessions with a customizable name and platform, keeping your work organized.
3. Automatic Screenshot Downloads: Save screenshots as PNG files directly to your device.
4. Google Sheets Integration: Automatically upload session data and screenshot URLs to Google Sheets for easy tracking and sharing.
5. Google Drive Storage: Screenshots are saved in a dedicated Google Drive folder, accessible via links in the sheet.
6. Perfect for users who need to collect, store, and organize screenshots in a structured way across different websites and sessions.
